name: Petare's Angels (MLNDR x BARDEZ32 x DOMIVAKERO)
description:
This piece is called "Petare's Angels" and it was created in collaboration with Bardez32 and Domivakero.
 
Artist Notes:  
"Petare" is known as one of the largest slums in the world (currently 7th place in the world ranks)
Located in my hometown Caracas, Venezuela, it is also one of the most violent slums in the world and there is a permanent humanitarian crisis happening in it.

The piece aims to convey how children are degenerated since they are born by growing between thugs and drug cartels. 
Kids grow up with no future on this place and I thought I'd raise some awareness about it.  

I’ll be donating a portion of the proceeds to an ONG bringing food to the people of Petare. The ONG selected is called Alimenta la Solidaridad Petare ❤️  Make sure to donate if you can via their Gofundme page.   

Thank you so much #NFTcommunity and specially thank you Kideight for the opportunity to participate on this great event! 

I hope you all enjoy the piece as much as we did while creating it!
